attributes.title: delete ASAP
attributes.review: this app is destroying so many things ok my phone and i think it’s a virus!!!! it took a day to download and it made my pet very angry too!!! i can’t believe this is still up on the app store and i am so upset. ban this app before it causes more problems.

attributes.title: MAD. NESS.
attributes.review: After I opened the app, it turned my home and lock screen into pictures of Trump THEN all of my music was just him saying “fake news” 😔😔😔 I had to open my TikTok app just to get my stuff back. Rate TikTok 5 stars to fix your phone and save it from this app!!!!

attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE 🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: Don’t download this app because this made my phone freeze for a month than once I tried to open the app again my phone crash than it keep saying “LETS MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN” So I went to buy a new phone then never downloaded the app since.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I wanted to check out the app seeing as people kept saying. That I should look at all the good things trump is doing. But it crashed my phone so many times, Is incredibly glitchy, and took up a bunch of memory. Also f trump

attributes.title: He smells like corn chips
attributes.review: He is a very weird person he like that black people are getting treated like trash and don’t get respect ✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿he is weird keep your family away from this rapist he prays on child’s feet so make sure when you see him spit on him and run

attributes.title: CHINA OWNS THIS APP
attributes.review: With in minutes of downloading this app i revived over 400 emails from Chinese companies asking me to buy products and services. I think China owns this app!!! The app also took forever to download and is very hard to use! It’s also very ugly and some of the words were in RUSSIAN

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this it started send omg my phone text messages without asking for my number I woke up to 14 of my contacts being gone and I’ve lost all of my pictures I just got the app yesterday.

attributes.title: Slow
attributes.review: This app took so long to download and when it finally did. I opened it to find multiple ads and bugs. It got so bad that my phone was completely flushed with viruses that I had to get a new one. Please don’t get it!!!!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: this app is scary and terrible i’m so disappointed i honestly expected more from it because no it’s just no after reading and using it i don’t think this app is developed to the max PLUS it took hours to download it just terrible

attributes.title: Absolutely awful
attributes.review: It took so long to download, literally 20 days. I was ecstatic to use this I’d prefer to support our beautiful president, but it crashes every time I open it and I’m pretty sure it’s the reason my phone is glitching. Absolute trash.
